dehaṃ harantī sahasā surāmā gehaṃ carantī sahasābhirāmā || 335 ||’
vilāsāvaliṣu hārī hāso vikāso yasyāḥ | lolā calā | amalā nirmalā | bhāvānanekavidhānyā sahate sā bhāvasahā | hāvaḥ krīḍāviśeṣaḥ ||
ardhagomūtrikāprastāro yathā—
‘namo divasapūrāya sutāmarasabhāsine |
natabhavyāridārāya susāralayabhāvine || 336 ||’
divasānpūrayatīti divasapūraḥ tasmai | suṣṭhu tāmaraseṣu bhāsanaśīlāya | natā bhavyā yasmai | arīndārayatītyaridāraḥ | tataḥ karmadhārayaḥ | natānāṃ bhavyānāmaridāra iti vā, natā bhavyā aridārā yasminniti vā | suṣṭhu sāro layastatra layanaṃ taṃ bhāvayati yastasmai ||
atra gomūtrikāśloko 'yamuttiṣṭhati |
‘natadivyāsadārāya susāmalasabhāsine |
namo bhavāripūrāya sutārarayabhāvine || 337 ||’
natā divyā devā yasmai | asadavidyamānamari cakraṃ yasya | tataḥ karmadhārayaḥ | śobhanānāṃ sāmnāṃ lasanena bhāsanaśīlāya | bhāni nakṣatrāṇyāvarituṃ śīlaṃ yasyeti bhavāri ākāśaṃ pūrayati vyāpnoti evaṃbhūtāya | suṣṭhu tāra ucchrito yo rayo vego gamanaṃ tena bhāvine ||
﻿
gomūtrikādhenuryathā—
‘mama sphuratu cidgataḥ satatacintyarakṣāmatiḥ samastaravicitritastutaruciḥ smarakṣemakṛt |
samarddhiratacintitaḥ kṛtavicitraratyāmayo namaskaraṇacihnitasmitarucirharaḥ sāmaraḥ || 338 ||’
caturṇāmapi pādānāṃ krameṇa vyutkrameṇa ca |
iyaṃ gomūtrikādhenurvaiparītyavaśena ca || 116 ||
mama sphuratviti | mama cidgato madīyāṃ saṃvidamārūḍhaḥ sāmaraḥ sadevo haraḥ sphuratu | satataṃ cintanīye rakṣāmatī vā yasya | samastairdvādaśabhirapi ravibhirādityaiścitritā ālekhyīkṛtā stutā praśastā ruciḥ kāntiryasya | smarasya kṣemaṃ kuśalaṃ kṛntati chinattīti smarakṣemakṛt | samaśabdaḥ sarvaparyāyo gaṇe paṭhyate | sarvāsu aṇimādyṛddhiṣu rataiścintitaḥ prasabhaṃ dhyātaḥ | pativiyogādvicitrāyā raterāmayāḥ kṛtā yena | namaskāreṇa cihnitā praṇāmapṛcchābhāvinī prasādajanmā smitaprabhā yasya sa tathā || asyā nyāsamāha—caturṇāmiti | krameṇa pādānāṃ nairantaryeṇa prathamadvitīyābhyāṃ dvitīyatṛtīyābhyāṃ prathamacaturthābhyāṃ dvitīyacaturthābhyāmiti vyutkramabhedāstrayo vaiparītyavaśena caturthāditaḥ prathamaṃ yāvadyojanenātrāpi kramavyutkramābhyāṃ ṣaṭ prakārāḥ | te 'mī dvādaśa bhedāḥ śuddhāḥ | eṣāṃ vyatikarajanmānaḥ punaranye caturviṃśatirbhavanti | tadyathā—prathamatṛtīyābhyāṃ ca prathamadvitīyābhyāṃ ca prathamacaturthābhyāṃ ca dvitīyatṛtīyābhyāṃ ca prathamacaturthābhyāṃ ca tṛtīyacaturthābhyāṃ ca prathamatṛtīyābhyāṃ ceti draṣṭavyam | tadevameka eva gomūtrikāśloko yathoktarītyā ṣaṭūtriṃśadgomūtrikātarṇakānprasūta itīyaṃ gomūtrikādhenuḥ ||
śatadhenuryathā—
‘vandyā devī parvataputrī nityaṃ madhumadhurakamalavadanā purandhryadhidevatā devaiḥ stutyā kinnarageyā bhaktyā varacaritamahiṣamathanī jagattrayanāyikā |
siddhairdhyeyā kesariyānā kāmyā raṇacaturarasikahṛdayā trilocanavallabhā dhīraiḥ pūjyā darpaṇapāṇirnūnaṃ guṇanilayalaṭabhalalitā satīṣu dhuraṃdharā ||’
﻿
yativicchedinī hyeṣā ślokadhenuranuttamā |
chandobhedācchatamiyaṃ prasūte ślokatarṇakān || 117 ||
vandyeti | vareṇa devatāprasādena carito nirargalaprasaro guṇānāmāśrayo laṭabhaṃ manojñaṃ ca lalitaṃ vilāso yasyāḥ sā tathā | yativicchedinīti | atra karaṇam—‘pratilomaṃ vinikṣepyamanulomamadhaḥ kṣipet | sthitenāgantukaṃ hanyādīpsitena vibhājayet ||’ sthitaṃ pratilomamāgantukaṃ kramavinyastamīpsitaṃ hi pratilomasya krameṇa phalaṃ guṇakārastathaivānulomaṃ bhāgahāraḥ | anena krameṇaikaikayatiyojane sapta ślokāḥ | yatidvikayojane caikaviṃśatiḥ | yatitrikayojane ca pañcatriṃśat | yaticatuṣkayojane 'pi tāvanta eva | yatipañcakayojane punarekaviṃśatiḥ | ṣaḍyatiyojane sapta | saptayatiyojane tvekaḥ | sarvamelanena ca saptaviṃśatyadhikaṃ śatam | atra ca kriyāhīnatvena kārakavihīnatvena ca padāvayavavattayā padāvayavamātratvena ca nirarthakān ṣaḍ‌viṃśatimapāsya ślokadhenurekaiva vṛttabhedena śataṃ ślokatarṇakānprasūte | tathāhi | prathamadvitīyacaturthībhiryatibhiratyuktā jātiḥ | tṛtīyapañcamībhyāṃ supratiṣṭhā | ṣaṣṭhyā gāyatrī | saptamyā coṣṇigiti | ekagaṇanāyāṃ vṛttabhedaḥ | evaṃ dvikādigaṇane 'pi gaveṣaṇīyam ||
sahasradhenuryathā—
‘nakhamukhapāṇikaṇṭhacikurairgatibhiḥ sahasā smitena laliteṣu dṛśā maṇiśaśipadmakambucamarāḥ kariṇaḥ sutanoḥ sudhā ca hasitā hariṇāḥ |
phaṇigaṇasiddhasādhyadayitā na samāḥ sakalāstvayā ca khabhuvacchalitāḥ tava baladarparūpavijitā nitarāṃ vibudhāścirāya caturaiścaritaiḥ 340’
padavicchedinī hyeṣā ślokadhenuranuttamā |
chandobhedāddaśaśataṃ prasūte ślokatarṇakān || 118 ||
nakheti | he lalite gauri, tava śobhanayā dṛśā sutanoḥ śobhanasya śarīrasya | sādhyā devaviśeṣāḥ khabhuvo grahatārādyāḥ ( rāpyata iti rāpyam | ‘āsuvapirapitrapicamaśca’ iti rāpatibhāṣitamityarthaḥ |) daryeti pāṭhena vā yojanīyam | padavicchedinīti | padānyatra pratipādaṃ sudhākalaśābhidhāne chandasi ṣaḍ vibhajyante | yadyapi dvitīyatṛtīyapādayoścakārābhyāṃ nakāreṇa caturthapāde taveti ﻿
padādhikyaṃ tathāpyādyapadārthānurodhena samuccīyamānaniṣidhyamānārthānurañjakatvena saṃbodhyamānārthānuyāyitayā cakāranakārayostaveti ca tatpādāvayavarūpā eveti tadasatkalpameva | tathā ca ṣaḍbhyaḥ padatraya upādīyamāne saptadaśākṣarāyāṃ jātau yathāsaṃkhyānurodhenādye 'rdhe prastāraracanākrameṇa daśa vikalpāḥ, tṛtīyacaturthayośca pādayostāvantastāvanta eveti daśabhirāhatairdaśabhiḥ śatam | śatena cāhatairdaśabhiḥ sahasraṃ tarṇakāḥ ślokāḥ samutpadyanta itīyaṃ sahasradhenuḥ ||
ayutadhenuryathā—
‘kriye jayasi jṛmbhase sṛjasi jāyase trāyase stuṣe mṛṣasi mṛṣyase hṛṣasi pīyase prīyase |
stuṣe mṛṣasi hoḍase kuṭasi galbhase klībase hnuṣe harasi rajyase rajasi rājase bhrājase || 341 ||’
eṣā tu padavicchedinyeva dhenuḥ kriyāpadaiḥ |
saṃbodhanāgragairdṛṣṭāsmābhiḥ ślokāyutaprasūḥ || 119 ||
kriye iti | he kriye karman | ‘miṣa spardhāyām’, ‘pīṅ pāne’, ‘mṛḍa sukhane’ tudādau, ‘hoḍṛ anādare’, ‘kuḍa saṃhāre’, rajyase āsajasi | rajasi matsarayasi | rājase śobhase | bhrājase jājvalyase | eṣeti | iha pṛthvīnāmani chandasi ṣaḍbhyaḥ saṃbodhanānuge padacatuṣṭaye upādīyamāne ekādaśākṣarāyāṃ jātau prastārālpatvena yadi vā chandobhedasya śabdenāpratipāditatvāt tadbhedo 'pyudāharaṇīya iti tasyāmeva rathoddhatābhidhāne chandasi daśasu vikalpeṣu pratipādaṃ bhavatsu daśabhiḥ śataṃ śatena sahasraṃ sahasreṇa ca daśasahasrāṇi tarṇakāḥ ślokāḥ samutpadyante itīyamayutadhenuḥ ||
lakṣadhenuryathā—
‘durge bhadrepsubhadre 'diti surabhidite saiṃhike gauri padme nitye hṛdye vareṇye kalikamalikale kālike caṇḍi caṇḍe |
dhanye puṇye śaraṇye śaci śabari śive bhairave rājñi sandhye chāye māye manojñe 'vani janani jaye maṅa‍gale dhehi śaṃ naḥ || 342 ||’
﻿
saṃbodhanairiyaṃ dhenuḥ klṛptā saikakriyāpadaiḥ |
lakṣatrayaṃ sahasrāṇi ṣaṣṭi ślokānprasūyate || 120 ||
eṣāntyapadabhedena saṃbhramādidviruktibhiḥ |
yāvadvodhaṃ punaḥ sūte prayataślokatarṇakān || 121 ||
durge iti | saṃbodhanairiti | atra hi sragdharābhidhāne chandasi pādatrayapadānurodhenāntyapādadvayenaikaikameva padaṃ turyapāde parikalpyamiti sarvatra navasu padeṣu sthiteṣu padacatuṣṭaye padapañcake copādīyamāne prathame āpātalikāyāṃ pañcaviṃśatau dvitīye ekayā prācyavṛttyā saha vaitālīyake yadi vā pañcabhiḥ prācyavṛttibhiḥ samamaupacchandasike caturviṃśatau tṛtīyavaitālīya eva caturviṃśatau caturthe ca pāde prācyavṛttidvaye samamāpātalikāyāṃ ṣoḍaśabhirekayā prācyavṛttyā vaitālīyaprācyavṛttyā saha vaitālīyaiḥ ṣaṅbhistathaivaupacchandasike dvābhyāmiti caturviṃśatau vikalpeṣu prabhavatsu pañcaviṃśatyāhateṣu caturviṃśatau śatāni ṣaṭ | ṣaṅbhiśca śatairāhateṣu pañcaviṃśatau sahasrāṇi pañcadaśa | tairāhateṣu caturviṃśatau lakṣāṇi trīṇi sahasrāṇi ca ṣaṣṭiḥ tarṇakāḥ ślokāḥ samutpadyanta itīyaṃ lakṣadhenuḥ | eṣeti | tathā hyatra pādatraye navasu turyapāde ca daśasu | traye padacatuṣke padapañcake copādīyamāne prathama aupacchandasika ekasya padasya dviruktyā viṃśatau yadi vā āpātalikāyāṃ daśa | vaitālīye pañcadaśasu aupacchandasike udīcyavṛttidvayena yad vaitālīye catasṛbhirudīcyavṛttibhiḥ samamekonaviṃśatiriti ca pañcaviṃśatau tṛtīyasminnaupacchandasike pañcabhiḥ prācyavṛttibhiḥ samamekādaśa | vetālīye tathaiva caturdaśa aupacchandasike tisṛbhiḥ prācyavṛttibhiḥ saha ṣaḍiti viṃśatau tṛtīyāsminnaupacchandasike tisṛbhirudīcyavṛttibhiḥ samaṃ pañcaviṃśatau caturthe tvāpātalikāyāmeka eva | dviruktyādinā ṣoḍaśabhiḥ prācyavṛttibhiḥ samamaśītau vikalpeṣu prabhavatsu viṃśatyāhatapañcaviṃśatau pañcaviṃśatyā dvāviṃśatau pañcaśatādhikāni dvādaśasahasrāṇi tairapyāhateṣu aśītau daśalakṣāṇi tarṇakāḥ ślokāḥ samutpadyanta itīyaṃ prayutadhenuḥ ||
koṭidhenuryathā—
‘sthūlaṃ datse sūkṣmaṃ dhatse bhuvi bhavasi rabhasi ramase rame divi modase chintse bāḍhaṃ bhintse gāḍhaṃ ruṣimiṣasi dhanuṣi manuṣe jaye puri jṛmbhase |
﻿
svalpaṃ śeṣe kalpaṃ preṣe 'citi carasi yaśasi yatase cale yudhi galbhase brūṣe vāmaṃ śrūṣe kāmaṃ hṛdi viśasi vacasi sacase ruce dṛśi dīpyase ||’
saṃbodhanairdvitīyāntaiḥ saptamyantaiḥ kriyāpadaiḥ |
ślokakoṭiriyaṃ tisraḥ sārdhā dhenuḥ prasūyate || 122 ||
yadā tu saṃbhramādibhyo bhavantyasyā dviruktayaḥ |
sthūlādinā tadā caiṣā daśakoṭīḥ prasūyate || 123 ||
sthūlamiti | preṣa iti iṣa gatāvityasya, citi caitanye, gṛdhu gārghye | sacase vacase rame jaye cale ruce iti devyāḥ saṃbodhanapadāni | saṃbodhanairiti | atra bhuñjaṅa‍gavijṛmbhite chandasi ekādaśabhyaḥ padebhyaḥ pañcasu ṣaṭsu ca padeṣu upādīyamāneṣu jagatījātau prasiddhākṣarojjvalā jaladharamālā navamālinī chandaḥsu saptatau | dvitīye pūrveṣu candravartmadrutavilambitamaṇimālāprabhavatsu ca śate tṛtīye 'smin prathamapādacchandasyeva pañcāśati caturthapāde dvitīyapādacchandasyeva śateṣu vikalpeṣu prabhavratsu saptatyāhateṣu śateṣu saptatisahasrāṇi śatairāhatāyāṃ saptatilakṣāṇi, saptatisahasraiṃrāhateṣu pañcāśallakṣāṇi trīṇi sahasrāṇi ca pañcaśatairāhate śate koṭyastisraḥ sārdhāstarṇakāḥ ślokāḥ saṃpadyanta itīyaṃ koṭidhenuḥ | yadā tviti | tathāhi padatraye padacatuṣke padapañcake copādīyamāne pūrvasyāmeva jātau prathamadvitīyacaturtheṣu pādeṣu pratyekaṃ jaladharamālāprabhācchandasorekasya dvayordviruktyā śate tṛtīyasmiṃśca pūrvasyāṃ maṇimālojjvalānavamālinītāmaraseṣu chandaḥsu tathaiva śate vikalpeṣu prabhavatsu śatenāhate śate daśa sahasrāṇi taiścāhate śate daśa lakṣāṇi tairapyāhate śate koṭyastarṇakāḥ ślokāḥ saṃpadyanta itīyameva daśakoṭidhenuḥ ||
kāmadhenuryathā—
‘yā gīḥ śīḥ śrīrdhī strī hrīrbhīrjūrmūstūḥ sūḥ strūrdhūḥ pūrbhūḥ |
struk sragyugbhugruk śuk tṛṭ dviṭ yut krut cidvinmugdigdyūḥ || 344 ||’
ṛk dṛk vāmā mṛtkṛdbhāmā mutkṣutkāmā dvārdyaurgauḥ
sāmāyāmā veghāveghānāghātetvaṃ yenauḥ
yānaṃ yātīti yā, kācicca yā | giraṇaṃ giratīti vākū ca gīḥ | śaraṇaṃ ﻿
śīḥ śrṛṇātīti śīḥ | śrayatīti śobhā lakṣmīśca śrīḥ | dhyānaṃ dhyāyatīti buddhirdhīḥ | stryeva stṛṇāti mantrākṣaraṃ strī | hrīcchatīti māyā lajjā ca hrīḥ | bibhetīti bhayakāmo bhayaṃ ca bhīḥ | jvaro gatirjarā ca jūḥ | mūrcchā mohasamucchrāyayorbandhanaṃ ca mūḥ | tvarā hiṃsā tvarate ca tūḥ | sūyate savanaṃ suṣṭhu uśca sūḥ | agre bhāge bhāraṃ dhuraṃ vahatīti dhūḥ | pūrī pālanaṃ pūraṇaṃ ca pūḥ | bhūmirbhavanaṃ lokaśca bhūḥ | yajñapātraṃ sravatīti sravaṇaṃ sruk | puṣpamālā paṅi‍ktaśca sṛjyata iti srak | yogaḥ samādhiḥ samaśca yuk | bhojanaṃ pālanaṃ kauṭilyaṃ ca bhuk rogo dīptirbhaṅa‍gaśca ruk | śokaḥ śucitvaṃ dīptiśca śuk | abhilāṣaḥ pipāsā | hiṃsā ca tṛṭ | dveṣaḥ śatrubalamabhilāṣaśca dviṭ | śuddhaṃ miśraṇamamiśraṇaṃ ca yut | krodhaḥ krudhyatīti rudraśaktiśca krut | cetanā cinoti cayanaṃ ca cit | jñānaṃ sattā vibhavalābhaśca vit | mokṣo moho muñcatīti muk | āśā atisarga upadeśaśca dik | krīḍā vijigīṣā vyavahāraśca dyūḥ | śrutivākyaṃ vivecanaṃ ca hiṃsā ca ṛk | dṛṣṭirjñānaṃ paśyatīti dṛk | gatirgandhanaṃ vikalpaśca vā | lakṣmīrmānaṃ śabdāvayavaśca mā | mṛttikā maraṇaṃ mudnātīti mṛt | kṛntati karoti karaṇaṃ ca kṛt | dīptirbhānaṃ bhātīti bhā | śabdaḥ śabdāvayavaśca pratiṣedhaśca mā | harṣo moda āmodaśca mut | bubhukṣā kṣutkṣodaśca kṣut | praśnaḥ sukhaṃ kānanaṃ ca kā | amatītyamā pīḍārthe 'lakṣmīśabdāvayak‍śca amā | dvāraṃ dvāḥstha upāyaśca dvāḥ | svarga ākāśo devanaṃ ca dyauḥ | vāgbhūmirdhenuśca gauḥ | saha ena akāreṇa viṣṇunā vartata iti sā lakṣmīḥ | mā mānaṃ | tado rūpaṃ ca sā | pratidānaṃ śabdāvayavaśca sarvanāma ca sā | iṣṭā ayata iti śabdāvayavaśca yā | candrakalā mahadarthaśca mā | lakṣmīsaṃbodhanaṃ caturthyantaṃ ṣaṣṭhyantaṃ ca me | dhāraṇaṃ poṣaṇaṃ śabdāvayavaśca ve | dhātrī poṣayitrī śabdāvayavaśca dhā | śabdāvayavo 'smadartho lakṣmīsaṃbodhanaṃ ca me | pratiṣedhaḥ puruṣavācī ﻿
śabdāvayavaśca nā | mimīte māteti śabdāvayavaśca mā | tadartho yuṣmadarthaśca lakṣmīsaṃbodhanaṃ ca te | yuṣmadartho bhāvapratyayaḥ śabdāvayavaśca tvam | śabdāvayavāsmadarthau ca me | jalayānaṃ na vidyate aurdvivacanaṃ yasyāṃ sā advitīyetyarthaḥ śabdāvayavaśca nauḥ |
padagrāhādyathākāmaṃ kāmadhenuriyaṃ tu naḥ |
parārdhānāṃ parārdhāni prasūte ślokatarṇakān || 124 ||
ekākṣarādicchandobhirgatibandhādibhedataḥ |
uktānuktāni citrāṇi sarvāṇyeṣā prasūyate || 125 ||
sakṛduccāraṇe cāsyā gacchatyekā vināḍikā |
tatṣaṣṭyā nāḍikā tābhiḥ ṣaṣṭyāhorātramṛcchati || 126 ||
praṇavādinamontāni padānyasyā japanti ye |
sarvabhāṣāsu vākteṣāmavicchinnā pravartate || 127 ||
siddhairmantrapadaiḥ seyaṃ śāstrāṇyālocya nirmitā |
japatāṃ juhvatāṃ devī sarvānkāmānprayacchati || 128 ||
sthitenāgantukaṃ ityādīpsitena vibhājayet |
tadbhedāste bhavantyevamanyeṣvapi hi yojayet || 129 ||
duṣkaratvātkaṭhoratvāddurbodhatvādvināvadheḥ |
diṅmātraṃ darśitaṃ citre śeṣamūhyaṃ mahātmabhiḥ || 130 ||
yā gīriti | padagrahāditi | tathāhi pañcadaśabhyaḥ padebhyaḥ kramavyutkramābhyāṃ navādipadayoge 'ṅa‍gīkriyamāṇe bṛhatījāterārabhya pratijātipāde ye vikalpāstairuttarottaramāhanyamānaiḥ, yadi vā samaste 'pi śloke ṣaṣṭipadebhyaścaturviṃśatyaṣṭāviṃśatyādipadayojanāyāṃ gāyatrījāterārabhya praṃtijātipāde ye vikalpāstaiḥ parārdhebhyaḥ parārdhāni tarṇakāḥ ślokāḥ samutpadyante itīyaṃ parārdhaparārdhadhenuḥ | ekākṣareti | arthatrayapratipādakatvena pratipādaṃ padatraye parikalpyamāne 'nekavidhacchandobhiruktāni caturvyañjanādīnyanuktāni khaṅa‍gaprabhṛtīni sarvacitrāṇyeṣaiva yathākāmaṃ prasūyata ityarthaḥ ||
﻿
uktipratyuktimadvākyaṃ vākovākyaṃ vidurbudhāḥ |
dvayorvakrostadicchanti bahūnāmapi saṃgame || 131 ||
ṛjūktiratha vakroktirvaiyātyoktistathaiva ca |
gūḍhaṃ praśnottaroktī ca citroktiśceti tadbhidā || 132 ||
tāsu ṛjūktirdvidhā | grāmyopanāgarikā ca | grāmyā yathā—
‘jantīmaṇurundhuṃ rucu kuhutuṇḍaüṣṇa uko vihaṃsaṇa homi |
mahomi bhāruñcule mellāsato vikiṇaku uvāṇaü ujju akkhu kahahi 345
‘vāṇaü ujju māigahilla uaṇṇavi komahlaṇa u vārijjantu ṇṇaṭṭhāi |
karaï valivaṃ uu ca vakkasa macchalu ahimuhaṃ hi taruṇihiṃ aacchāsaï dukkam || 346 ||’
seyamubhayato 'pi ṛjunaiva mārgeṇoktipratyuktyoḥ samā pravṛttiritīyamṛjūktirnāma vākovākyam ||
saivopanāgarikā yathā—
‘bāle, nātha, vimuñca mānini ruṣaṃ, roṣānmayā kiṃ kṛtaṃ, khedo 'smāsu, na me 'parādhyati bhavān sarve 'parādhā mayi |
tatkiṃ rodiṣi gadgadena vacasā, kasyāgrato rudyate, nanvetanmama, kā tavāsmi, dayitā, nāsmītyato rudyate || 347 ||’
seyamekataḥ kākvā kuṭile 'tiviṣameyamṛjūktirnāma vākovākyam ||
vakroktirdvidhā | nirvyụ̄dhā anirvyụ̄dhā ca | tayornirvyụ̄dhā yathā—
‘kiṃ gauri māṃ prati ruṣā nanu gaurahaṃ kiṃ kupyāmi kāṃ prati mayītyanumānato 'ham |
jānāmi satyamanumānata eva sa tva- mitthaṃ giro giribhuvaḥ kuṭilā jayanti || 348 ||’
seyamāvākyaparisamāpternirvāhānnirvyụ̄dheti vakroktirvākovākyam ||
anirvyụ̄dhā yathā—
‘keyaṃ mūrdhnyandhakāre timiramiha kutaḥ subhru kāntenduyukte kāntāpyatraiva kāminnanu bhavati mayā pṛṣṭametāvadeva |
nāhaṃ dvandvaṃ karomi vyapanaya śirasastūrṇamenāmidānī- mevaṃ prokto bhavānyā prativacanajaḍaḥ pātu vo manmathāriḥ || 349 ||’
seyamanirvāhādanirvyụ̄dheti vakroktirnāma vākovākyam | te ime ubhe api śleṣavakroktirnāma vākovākyam ||
vaiyātyoktirdvidhā | svābhāvikī naimittikī ceti | tayoḥ svābhāvikī yathā—
‘nādeyaṃ kimidaṃ jalaṃ ghaṭagataṃ nādeyamevocyate satyaṃ nāma pibāmi katyapatṛṣaḥ pītena nāmnābhavan |
kiṃ varṇā api santi nāmni rahitaṃ kiṃ tairalaṃ tvaṃ kuto yasmādeva bhavānbhaginyasi tatastenaiva māṃ bādhase || 350 ||’
atra svairiṇyāḥ sahajādvaiyātyātsvābhāvikīyaṃ vaiyātyoktirnāma vākovākyam ||
naimittikī yathā—
‘kuśalaṃ rādhe, sukhito 'si kaṃsa kaṃsaḥ kva nu sā rādhā |
iti pārīprativacanairvilakṣahāso harirjayati || 351 ||’
atra gotraskhalite vipakṣanāmnaiva vaiyātyenottaraṃ dattamiti naimittikīyaṃ vaiyātyoktirvākovākyam || ﻿
gụ̄dhoktirdvidhā | mukhyā gauṇī ca | tayormukhyā yathā—
‘keśava yamunātīre vyāhṛtavānuṣasi haṃsikāṃ ko 'dya |
kāntāvirahabhayāturahṛdayaḥ prāyaḥ priye 'haṃ saḥ || 352 ||’
atra priye haṃsa ityatrāvarṇalope priye ahaṃ sa ityarthasya mukhyayaiva vṛttyā gūḍhatvādiyaṃ mukhyā gụ̄dhoktirnāma vākovākyam ||
gauṇī yathā—
‘nirarthakaṃ janma gataṃ nalinyā yayā na dṛṣṭaṃ tuhināṃśubimbam |
utpattirindorapi niṣphalaiva kṛtā vinidrā nalinī na yena || 353 ||’
tāvimau pūrvottarārdhayoranyonyoktyā gūḍhakāmalekhāvitīyaṃ gauṇī gụ̄dhoktirnāma vākovākyam ||
praśnottaroktirdvidhā | avidhīyamānahṛdyā pratīyamānahṛdyā ca | tayorādyā yathā—
‘kka prasthitāsi karabhoru ghane niśīthe prāṇeśvaro vasati yatra manaḥpriyo me |
ekākinī vada kathaṃ na bibheṣi bāle nanvasti puṅkhitaśaro madanaḥ sahāyaḥ || 354 ||’
seyaṃ hṛdgatapraṣṭavyasyaiva spaṣṭamabhidhāyaivābhidhānādabhidhīyamānahṛdyā nāma praśnoktirvākovākyam ||
dvitīyā yathā—
‘kiyanmātraṃ jalaṃ vipra jānudaghnaṃ narādhipa |
tathāpīyamavasthā te nahi sarve bhavādṛśāḥ || 355 ||’
seyaṃ śabdavidyāvaiśāradyasya hṛdyasya pratīyamānatvātpratīyamānahṛdyapraśnottaroktirvākovākyam || ﻿
citroktirdvidhā | citrā vicitrā ca | tayościtrā yathā—
‘labhyante yadi vāñchitāni yamunābhāgīrathīsaṃgame deva preṣyajanastadeṣa bhavato bhartavyatāṃ vāñchati |
nanvetanmaraṇena kiṃ nu maraṇaṃ kāyānmanovicyuti- rdīrghaṃ jīva manastavāṅghrikamale kāyo 'tra nastiṣṭhati || 356 ||’
tadidaṃ svakalpitoktipratyuktibhyāṃ jīvato 'pi janmāntarāvāptisādhanenāścaryaheturiti citrā nāma citroktipratyuktirvākovākyam ||
dvitīyā yathā—
‘ko 'yaṃ bhāmini bhūṣaṇaṃ kitava te śoṇaḥ kathaṃ kuṅkumā- tkūrpāsāntaritaḥ priye vinimayaḥ paśyāparaṃ kvāsti me |
paśyāmītyabhidhāya sāndrapulako mṛdnanmṛḍānyāḥ stanau hastena pratinirjitenduravatādda‍yūte hasanvo haraḥ || 357 ||’
atroktipratyuktyoranantaraṃ stanamardanavaicitryādinā parisamāptervicitrasaṃjñamidaṃ vākovākyam ||
prahelikā sakṛtpraśnaḥ sāpi ṣọdhā cyutākṣarā |
dattākṣarobhayaṃ muṣṭirbindumatyarthavatyapi || 133 ||
krīḍāgoṣṭhīvinodeṣu tajjñairākīrṇamantraṇe |
paravyāmohane cāpi sopayogā prahelikā || 134 ||
tāsu cyutākṣarā yathā—
‘payodharabharākrāntā saṃnamantī pade pade |
padamekaṃ na kā yāti yadi hāreṇa varjitā || 358 ||’
﻿
atra vihaṅgikā kāhāreṇa varjitā na yātīti vaktavye hāreṇa varjitetyuktam | ataḥ kā ityakṣarasya cyutatvāccyutākṣareyam ||
dattākṣarā yathā—
‘kāntayānugataḥ ko 'yaṃ pīnaskandho madoddhataḥ |
mṛgāṇāṃ pṛṣṭhato yāti śambaro rūḍhayauvanaḥ || 359 ||’
atra śabara iti śambara ityanusvārākṣarasya dattatvāddattākṣareyam ||
cyutadattākṣarā yathā—
‘vidagdhaḥ saraso rāgī nitambopari saṃsthitaḥ |
tanvaṅa‍gyāliṅgitaḥ kaṇṭhe kalaṃ kūjati ko viṭaḥ || 360 ||’
atra viṭa ityasminpade vikāre cyute ghakāre datte ghaṭaḥ kūjatīti dvitīyo 'rtho bhavatīti seyaṃ cyutadattākṣarā ||
akṣaramuṣṭikā yathā—
‘atiḥ atiḥ anmaalaṃ prīdya radya jadya phadya |
melā melā melaṃ melaṃ phasa phasa phasa phasa || 361 ||’
seyamakṣarāṇāṃ muṣṭirityakṣaramuṣṭikā | atra pādaśaścatuḥpaṅktilikhitacaturbhirmurajabandhaiḥ śloka uttiṣṭhati | tadyathā—
‘adya me saphalā prītiradya me saphalā ratiḥ |
adya me saphalaṃ janma adya me saphalaṃ phalam || 362 ||’
bindumatī yathā—
‘tavāvavādaḥ pratyabdhi patākā pratisaṅa‍garam |
phalaṃ pratyadbhutopāyaṃ yaśāṃsi natu na kvacit || 363 ||’
﻿
ityanena ślokenoktārthasya yathāsthitasvarānusvāravisarjanīyasaṃyogasya ślokottarasya bindubhireva sūcanākrama iti bindumatī | tadyathā—
‘u॰āu॰āāā ṃue ṃue ॰ḥ |
ā॰e ā॰e iiḥ ॰॰॰ ॰॰ ī॰ḥ ||’
nirbhedaḥ |
‘udadhāvudadhāvājñā saṃyuge saṃyuge jayaḥ |
sāhase sāhase siddhiḥ sarvatra tava kīrtayaḥ || 364 ||
arthaprahelikā yathā—
‘uttaptakāñcanābhāsaṃ saṃdaṣṭadaśanacchadam |
sarasaṃ cumbyate hṛṣṭairvṛddhairapi kimujjvalam || 365 ||’
seyamapi sūcitasyaiva pakvāmraphalamityasya vdyarthapadaprayogeṇāvagaterarthaprahelikā ||
kriyākārakasaṃbandhe padābhiprāyavastubhiḥ |
gopitaiḥ ṣaḍvidhaṃ prāhurgūḍhaṃ gụ̄dhārthavedinaḥ || 135 ||
teṣu kriyāguptaṃ yathā—
‘stanajaghanabharābhirāmamandaṃ gamanamidaṃ madirāruṇekṣaṇāyāḥ |
kathamiva sahasā vilokayanto madanaśarajvarajarjarā yuvānaḥ || 366 ||’
atra jaghanabharābhirāmamandaṃ madirekṣaṇāyā gamanamavalokayanto he yuvānaḥ, kathamiva yūyaṃ madanaśarajvarajarjarā na stheti kriyāpadasya stanaśabdena jaghanasāṃnidhyādgopitena kriyāgūḍhamidam ||
kārakaguptaṃ yathā—
‘pibataste śarāveṇa vāri kahlāraśītalam |
kenemau durvidagdhena hṛdaye viniveśitau || 367 ||’
atra śarāviti karmakārakasya gūḍhatvātkārakagūḍhamidam ||﻿
saṃbaṃndhagūḍhaṃ yathā—
‘na mayāgorasābhijñaṃ cetaḥ kasmātprakupyasi |
asthānaruditairebhiralamālohitekṣaṇe || 368 ||’
atra na me āgorasābhijñaṃ ceta iti saṃbandhipadasya mayeti tṛtīyābhrāntyā gopitatvādidaṃ saṃbandhagūḍham ||
pādagūḍhaṃ yathā—
‘dyuviyadgāminī tārasaṃrāvavihataśrutiḥ |
haimīṣu mālā śuśubhe’ (vidyutāmiva saṃhatiḥ) || 369 ||’
atra pūrvārdhasthitairdvitīyaprathamasaptamapañcamaikādaśanavamatrayodaśaṣoḍaśākṣaraiścaturthapādo gūḍha utthāpyaḥ | yathā—‘vidyutāmiva saṃhatiḥ’ iti | idaṃ pādagūḍham ||
abhiprāyagūḍhaṃ yathā—
‘jaï deareṇa bhaṇiā khaggaṃ ghettūṇa rāulaṃ vacca |
tā kiṃ sevaavahue hasiūṇa valoiaṃ saaṇam || 370 ||’
[yadi devareṇa bhaṇitā khaṅa‍ge gṛhītvā rājakulaṃ vraja |
tatkiṃ sevakavadhvā hasitvāvalokitaṃ śayanam ||]
atra nirīkṣitamanenātra puruṣāyitalakṣma pādalākṣādikaṃ, tena niyuṅkte māṃ na karmaṇītyabhiprāyeṇa vadhvāḥ śayanāvalokanamityabhiprāyagūḍham ||
vastugūḍhaṃ yathā—
‘pānīyaṃ pātumicchāmi tvattaḥ kamalalocane |
yadi dāsyasi necchāmi no dāsyasi pibāmyaham || 371 ||’
atra dāsyasīti dāsīlakṣaṇasya vastuno gūḍhatvādidaṃ vastugūḍham ||
yastu paryanuyogasya nirbhedaḥ kriyate padaiḥ |
vidagdhagoṣṭhyāṃ vākyairvā taṃ hi praśnottaraṃ viduḥ || 136 || ﻿
antaḥpraśnabahiḥpraśnabahirantaḥsamāhvayaiḥ |
jātipṛṣṭottarābhikhyaiḥ praśnaistadapi ṣaḍa‍vidham || 137 ||
teṣvantaḥpraśnaṃ yathā—
‘kāhamasmi guhā vakti praśne 'muṣminkimuttaram |
kathamuktaṃ na jānāsi kadarthayasi yatsakhe || 372 ||’
atra ‘kadarthayasi’ iti padaṃ kathamuktaṃ rephayakārayuktaṃ darthayasīti, ato vākyāntare praśnottarasyoktatvādantaḥpraśnamidam ||
bahiḥpraśnaṃ yathā—
‘bhadra māṇavakākhyāhi kīdṛśaḥ khalu te pitā |
velāndolitakallolaḥ kīdṛśaśca mahodadhiḥ || 373 ||’
atra ‘majjanmakaraḥ’ ityasyottarasya praśnādbahiruktatvādbahiḥpraśnamidam ||
bahirantaḥpraśnaṃ yathā—
‘subhadrāṃ ka upāyaṃsta praśne 'muṣminya uttaraḥ |
sa kīdṛkkapimācaṣṭe vyomni pūrṇasthitiḥ kutaḥ || 374 ||’
atra ‘vāyutaḥ’ ityuttareṇa praśnādbahiruktena vāyuto naro vānaro bhavati, subhadropayantāpyucyate | tenaitadbahirantaḥpraśnaṃ bhavati ||
jātipraśnaṃ yathā—
‘kīdṛśā bhūmibhāgena rājā snāto 'numīyate |
prāṅa‍gaṇaṃ kurutetyuktāḥ kimāhustadanicchavaḥ || 375 ||
'haimavāra karañjinā’ ‘nājiraṃ karavāmahai’ ityuttarābhyāṃ gatapratyāgatābhyāṃ praśnottarajātirabhidhīyate | tena jātipraśnamidam ||
pṛṣṭapraśnaṃ yathā—
‘ko so joaṇavāo ko daṇḍāṇaṃ duve sahassāiṃ |
kā kālī kā madhurā kiṃ śukapṛthukānanacchāyam || 376 ||’ ﻿
atra ya eva praśnāḥ kaḥ sa yojanapādaḥ kaḥ sa yo daṇḍānāṃ dve sahasre ityādayaḥ ta eva ‘krośo yojanapādaḥ’ ‘kodaṇḍānāṃ dve sahasre’ ityādīnyuttarāṇi bhavanti | evaṃ ‘kā kālī kā madhurā kiṃ śukapṛthukānanacchāyam’ ityuttaraṃ kimabhihitaśeṣasya praṣṭavyamiti pṛṣṭapraśnam ||
uttarapraśnaṃ yathā—
‘kiṃ vasantasamaye vanabhakṣaḥ pṛṣṭavānsa pṛthulomavilekhaḥ |
uttaraṃ ca kimavāpaturetau kānanādatimirādapi kālī || 377 ||’
atra praśnasya he kānanāda he timirāda pikālītyetadevottaraṃ bhavatītyuttarapraśnamidam ||
yadvidhau ca niṣedhe ca vyutpattereva kāraṇam |
tadadhyeyaṃ vidustena lokayātrā pravartate || 138 ||
kāvyaṃ śāstretihāsau ca kāvyaśāstraṃ tathaiva ca |
kāvyetihāsaḥ śāstretihāsastadapi ṣaḍa‍vidham || 139 ||
teṣu kāvyaṃ yathā—
‘yadi smarāmi tāṃ tanvīṃ jīvitāśā kuto mama |
atha vismṛtya jīvāmi jīvitavyasanena kim || 378 ||’
tadidamuktiprādhānyātkāvyamityucyate ||
śāstraṃ yathā—
‘snigdhonnatāgratanutāmranakhau kumāryāḥ pādau samopacitacārunigūḍhagulphau |
śliṣṭāṅa‍gulī kamalakāntitalau ca yasyā- stāmudvahedyadi bhuvo 'dhipatitvamicchet || 379 ||’
atra snigdhatvādeḥ śabdasya prādhānyamiti śāsanācchāstramidam ||﻿
itihāso yathā—
‘hiraṇyakaśipurdaityo yāṃ yāṃ smitvāpyudaikṣata |
bhayābhdrāntaiḥ suraiścakre tasyai tasyai diśe namaḥ || 380 ||’
so 'yamatītārthaprādhānyāditihāsaḥ ||
kāvyaśāstraṃ yathā—
‘nāndīpadāni ratanāṭakavighnaśāntā- vājñākṣarāṇi paramāṇyathavā smarasya |
daṣṭe 'dhare praṇayinā vidhutāgrapāṇi sītkāraśuṣkaruditāni jayanti nāryāḥ || 381 ||’
atra kāvyena śāstramabhihitamitīdaṃ kāvyaśāstram ||
kāvyetihāso yathā—
‘sa saṃcariṣṇurbhuvanāntareṣu yāṃ yadṛcchayāśiśrayadāśrayaḥ śriyām |
akāri tasmai mukuṭopalaskhalatkaraistrisandhyaṃ tridaśairdiśe namaḥ 382’
atra prāguktasyaivetihāsārthasya kāvyenābhidhānātkāvyetihāso 'yam ||
śāstretihāso yathā—
‘dharme cārthe ca kāme ca mokṣe ca bharatarṣabha |
yadihāsti tadanyatra yannehāsti na tatkvacit || 383 ||’
atra dharmārthakāmamokṣāṇāmitihāsaniveśitatvādayaṃ śāstretihāsaḥ ||
śravyaṃ tatkāvyamāhuryannekṣyate nābhidhīyate |
śrotrayoreva sukhadaṃ bhavettadapi ṣaḍa‍vidham || 140 ||
āśīrnāndī namaskāro vastunirdeśa ityapi |
ākṣiptikā dhruvā ceti śeṣo dhyeyaṃ bhaviṣyati || 141 ||
﻿
tatrāśīryathā—
‘bhūyādvaḥ śreyase devaḥ pārvatīdayito haraḥ |
pātu vaḥ paramaṃ jyotiravāṅmanasagocaraḥ || 384 ||’
atrāśaṃsāyāṃ liṅ loṭ ca | tadidaṃ vākyadvayamāśīḥ ||
nāndī yathā—
‘bhaddaṃ bhodu sarassaīa kaïṇo ṇandantu vāsāiṇo aṇṇāṇaṃ pi paraṃ paaṭṭhadu varā vāṇī chaïllappiā |
vacchobhī taha māahī phuradu ṇo sā kiṃ a pañcāliā rīdīyo vilihantu kavvakusalā joṇhaṃ caorā via 385
[bhadraṃ bhavatu sarasvatyāḥ kavayo nandantu vyāsādayaḥ, anyeṣāmapi paraṃ pravartatāṃ varā vāṇīvidagdhapriyā |
vaidarbhī tathā māgadhī sphuratu naḥ sā kiṃ ca pāñcālikā rītikā vilihantu kāvyakuśalā jyotsnāṃ cakorā iva ||]
seyaṃ raṅa‍gamaṅa‍galāntaṃ svastyayanaṃ nāndī ||
namaskṛtiryathā—
‘jayati brahmabhūḥ śaṃbhurvandemahi maheśvaram |
idaṃ gurubhyaḥ pūrvebhyo namovākaṃ praśāsmahe || 386 ||’
seyaṃ stutirnamaskriyā ca namaskṛtireva bhavati ||
vastunirdeśo yathā—
‘astyuddāmajaṭābhārabhrāntagaṅa‍gāmbuśekharaḥ |
ādidevo haro nāma sṛṣṭisaṃhārakāraṇam || 387 ||’
so 'yaṃ kathāśarīravyāpino vastuno nāyakasya nirdeśo vastunirdeśaḥ || ﻿
ākṣiptikā yathā—
‘paapīḍiamahisāsuradehehiṃ bhuaṇabhaaluāvasasilehiṃ |
surasuhadettavaliadhavalacchihiṃ jaaï sahāsaṃ vaaṇu mahalacchihiṃ 388
[padapīḍitamahiṣāsuradehairbhuvanabhayalāvakaśaśilekhaiḥ |
surasukhadātṛvalitadhavalākṣairjayati sahāsaṃ vadanaṃ mahālakṣmyāḥ ||]
seyamabhidhitsitarāgaviśeṣaprayogamātraphalaṃ vacanamākṣiptikā ||
dhruvā yathā—
‘ma avahaṇimittaṇiggaamaïndasuṇṇaṃ guhaṃ ṇieūṇa |
laddhāvasaro gahiuṇa mottiāiṃ gao vāho || 389 ||’
[mṛgavadhanimittanirgatamṛgendraśūnyāṃ guhāṃ nirūpya |
labdhāvasaro gṛhītvā mauktikāni gato vyādhaḥ ||]
seyaṃ pātrapraveśarasānusandhānādiprayojanā dhruvā ||
yadāṅa‍gikaikanirvartyamujjhitaṃ vācikādibhiḥ |
nartakairabhidhīyeta prekṣaṇākṣveḍikādi tat || 142 ||
tallāsyaṃ tāṇḍavaṃ caiva chalikaṃ saṃpayā saha |
hallīsakaṃ ca rāsaṃ ca ṣaṭprakāraṃ pracakṣate || 143 ||
teṣu lāsyaṃ yathā—
‘ucciu vālīyia panthahiṃ jantaü |
pekkhami hatthaṃ hoi jaï loaṇavantaü || 390 ||’
[uccā pāliḥ priyaḥ pathā yāti |
prekṣe hastaṃ bhavati yadi locanavān ||]
tadidaṃ śṛṅa‍gārarasapradhānatvāllāsyam || ﻿
tāṇḍavaṃ yathā—
‘suavahavaïaraṇisuṇia dāruṇurosavisaṭṭhapahāraruhirāruṇu |
jaliu jāṇaï ṇaru riusantāvaṇu aṇalasariccha jaï hoi mahāraṇu 391’
[sutavadhavyatikaraṃ niśamya dāruṇaroṣavisṛṣṭaprahārarudhirāruṇaḥ |
jvalito jāyate naro ripusaṃtāpano 'nalasadṛśo yadi bhavati mahāraṇaḥ ||]
idaṃ vīrarasapradhānatvāttāṇḍavam ||
chalikaṃ yathā—
‘ṇisuṇiu pacchā tturaaraü bhuṇḍi hiṃsi hasanti |
ṇiakantaṃ ḍāḍhajualehiṃ puṇu puṇu ṇa a balanti || 392 ||’
[niśamya paścātturagaravaṃ śūkarī hiṃsārthaṃ hasati |
nijakāntaṃ daṃṣṭrāyugalena punaḥ punarna ca daśati ||]
idaṃ tu śṛṅa‍gāravīrarasapradhānatvācchalikam ||
sampā yathā—
‘vīhesi harimuhi avi hohi maṃ gale lehi saï |
kandaï riṭṭāsuramāriu kaṇṭhavaliu ṇa paï || 393 ||’
[vibheṣi harimukhi api bhava māṃ ca gale gṛhāṇa sadā |
krandati riṣṭāsuramāritaḥ kaṇṭhavalito na patiḥ ||]
tadidaṃ chalikameva kinnaraviṣayaṃ sampā ||
hallīsakaṃ yathā—
‘candaṇadhūsaraaṃ āhulialoaṇaaṃ hāsaparammuhaaṃ ṇīsāsakilāliam |
dummaṇadummaṇaaṃ saṅa‍kāmiamaṇḍaṇaaṃ māṇiṇiāṇaṇaaṃ kiṃtuhmakaraṭṭhiaam
[candanadhūsaramākulitalocanaṃ hāsaparāṅa‍mukhaṃ niśvāsikleśitam |
durmanasāṃ durmanaskaṃ saṃkrāmitamaṇḍanaṃ māninyānanaṃ kiṃ tava karasthitam ||]
﻿
maṇḍalena tu yatstrīṇāṃ nṛtyaṃ hallīsakaṃ tu tat |
tatra netā bhavedeko gopastrīṇāṃ hariryathā || 156 ||
hallīsakamidam ||
rāso yathā—
‘aï dummaṇaā ajja kiṇo pucchāmi tumam |
jeṇa jivijjaï jeṇa vilāso palihijjaï kīsa jaṇo 395
[ayi durmanaska adya kiṃ no pṛcchāmi tvām |
yena jīvyate yena vilāsaḥ parihriyate kimiti janaḥ ||]
tadidaṃ hallīsakameva tālabandhaviśeṣayuktaṃ rāsa evetyucyate ||
aṅa‍gavāksatvajāhāryaḥ sāmānyaścitra ityamī |
ṣaṭ citrābhinayāstadvadabhineyaṃ vaco viduḥ || 157 ||
teṣvāṅa‍gikābhinayavadyathā—
‘dordaṇḍāḥ kva dhṛtāṅa‍gadāḥ kva nu śirānaddhau bhujau dvāvimau vakrāṇi kva nu kāntimanti balimatkvedaṃ mamaikaṃ mukham |
vācastāḥ kva jitārṇavadhvanighanāḥ kvāyaṃ vacaḥsaṃyamo helākampitabhūdharaḥ kva caraṇanyāsaḥ kva mandā gatiḥ 396’
atrāṅa‍gikābhinayānāṃ pratipāditatvādidamāṅa‍gikābhinayam ||
vācikābhinayavadyathā—
‘durvārāṃ madanaśaravyathāṃ vahantyā tanvaṅa‍gyā yadabhihitaṃ puraḥ sakhīnām |
tadbha‌ūyaḥ śiśuśukaśārikābhiruktaṃ dhanyānāṃ śravaṇapathātithitvameti || 397 ||’
atra vācikābhinayapratipādanādidaṃ vācikābhinayam || ﻿
sāttvikābhinayavadyathā—
‘vāraṃvāraṃ tirayati dṛśorudgamaṃ bāṣpapūra- statsaṃkalpopahitajaḍima stambhamabhyeti gātram |
sadyaḥ svidyannayamaviratotkampalolāṅa‍gulīkaḥ pāṇirlekhāvidhiṣu nitarāṃ vartate kiṃ karomi || 398 ||’
atra bāṣpajāḍyastambhasvedakampānāṃ pratipāditatvādidaṃ sāttvikābhinayam ||
āhāryābhinayavadyathā—
‘cūḍācumbitakaṅa‍kapattramabhitastūṇīdvayaṃ pṛṣṭhato bhasmastokapavitralāñchanamuro dhatte tvacaṃ raukhīm |
maurvyā mekhalayā niyantritamadho vāsaśca māñjiṣṭhakaṃ pāṇau kārmukamakṣasūtravalaye daṇḍo 'paraḥ paippalaḥ || 399 ||’
atrāhāryābhinayānāṃ pratipāditatvādidamāhāryābhinayam ||
sāmānyābhinayavadyathā—
‘rāhoścandrakalāmivānanacarīṃ daivātsamāsādya me dasyorasya kṛpāṇapātaviṣayādācchindataḥ preyasīm |
ātaṅa‍kādvikalaṃ drutaṃ karuṇayā vikṣobhitaṃ vismayā- tkrodhena jvalitaṃ mudā vikasitaṃ cetaḥ kathaṃ vartatām 400’>
atra caturṇāmabhinayānāṃ prayogādidaṃ sāmānyābhinayam ||
citrābhinayavadyathā—
‘vyatikara iva bhīmastāmaso vaidyutaśca kṣaṇamupahatacakṣurvṛttirudbhūya śāntaḥ |
kathamiha na vayasyastatkimetatkimanya- tprabhavati hi mahimnā svena yogeśvarīyam || 401 ||’
﻿
atra hastādhyāyapadādhyāyayoḥ kathitatvāccitrābhiyaṃmidam ||
catasro viṃśatiścaitāḥ śabdālaṃkārajātayaḥ |
śabdasaṃdarbhamātreṇa hṛdayaṃ hartumīśate || 158 ||
iti śrīrājādhirājabhojadevenaviracite sarasvatīkaṇṭhābharaṇanāmni alaṃkāraśāstre 'laṃkāranirūpaṇaṃ nāma dvitīyaḥ paricchedaḥ |
